		mergeDocx (line 493)
	
 
	
	

This is the main method that does all the needed manipulation to merge


both docx documents

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
				
  • example: example
    • 
			

	
	

		void
		
			mergeDocx
		
					(string $firstDocument, string $secondDocument, string $finalDocument,  $options, array $options,)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$firstDocument: path to the first document			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$secondDocument: path to the second document			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$finalDocument: path to the final merged document			
    • 
					
  • 
				array
				$options,: Values:mergeType (0,1) that correspond to preserving or not the sections of the merged document respectively,  numbering (continue, restart)that allows to restart, for example, the page numbering in the merged document ($secondDocument).			
    • 
					
  • 
				
				$options			
    •
